attributes.action: Call a General Election. The country isn't being represented fairly or correctly
attributes.additional_details: Due to such low turnout in voting, the country is not being represented correctly..  Call a General election before this country becomes more damaged, or embarrassed further on the world stage.
attributes.background: The country isn't being represented fairly due to such a low voters turnout. If the current government is so confident in what it is doing, call an election and let more of eligible voters vote.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
